title: Umbra LF PLAYERS AND STAFF
body:
Umbra Esports is a dedicated team with a solid roster full of challenger players.
Umbra is currently seeking a Top Laner (Pref High Dia+)
Must be able to scrim 3 times per week ( Monday, Wednesday, Friday)
Must have discord, Must be able to adapt to what the team needs.

We are also seeking support staff for the players ( coaches ect ) ((no payment))
Add me on discord vynL#9999
or in game: vynL
